workExperiences.description:
Position: Software Developer 
 Duration: Nov 2021 - Present 
 • Developed education learning tools for university courses and faculties using React, TailwindCSS & MongoDB 
 • Collaborated in a team of 7,utlising project management tools like Jira and Bitbucket  
 • Actively participated in code reviews and contributed to the agile methodology

Position: Marketing Executive 
 Duration: Jan 2020 - Dec 2022 
 • Created & coordinated marketing campaigns for events to develop a community of women in tech at UQ 
 Created graphics and marketing schedules using programs like Canva, Adobe Photoshop & Excel 
  • Managed UQLIT social marketing including their instagram and facebook pages

Position: Software Intern 
  Duration: Sep 2021 
 • Developed a login authentication web app using Javascript and Firebase

Position: Student Learning Resource Developer 
 Duration: Aug 2020 - May 2021 
 • Served as a member promoting and developing resources based on improving the group-work experience for university students 
 • Designed and developed resources using software including Photoshop, Illustrator and Microsoft Word 
 • Co-conducted and analysed primary research from interview data using thematic analysis

Position: Student Ambassodor 
 Duration: Jan 2022 - Jan 2023 
 • Assisted in Leadhers, a program designed to uplift women in confidence & leadership 
 • Represented and promoted UQ's startup culture across faculties at events and workshops  
 • Pitched and developed strategies to promote Ventures programs across UQ

Position: Summer Researcher 
 Duration: Dec 2020 - Feb 2021 
 • Aided in the creation and development of web-based language resources 
  • Utitlised R and Docker, GitHub and Binder Notebooks 
 • Self-managed, prioritised, and organised tasks whilst working remotely with a global team

Position: Marketing Assistant 
 Duration: Nov 2022 - Dev 2022 
 • Experienced the startup culture in Singapore's vibrant and fast paced economic environment 
 • Developed marketing strategies and posts for a startup foodtech company AuroraFoods 
 • Redeveloped & updated the companys wordpress website using industry standard UI/UX processes & principles

Position: Software Intern 
 Duration: July 2022 - July 2022 
 • Developed a new feature aimed at introducing and educating users to cryptocurrency 
 • Used React, Typescript & Figma for developing the feature  
 • Created and delivered several pitches to the Swyftx team
